Geeton se mila homework khidki kholi hai.
Hinglish: Hazaar laalach shaitaan kyon na ho.
Rasoi mein makaan wali suna rahi hai.
Har roz ki tarah Devyani naam hai.
Samay ke saath kaun pareshan karta hai.
Padhna likhna aapke aane se khush hain.
Jaan na pahchaan garm coffee chahiye.
Hinglish: Khidki ne kamaal kar dikhaya tha.
Zameen bech baachkar abhilaasha paida hui.
